help:
Please use !help subject.
Subjects include: reset, add, shuffle, draw, send, read, clear
helpReset: Resets all of your piles to nil.
helpAdd: Adds the given card to your deck.
helpShuffle: Shuffles your discard pile into your deck.
helpDraw: Draw X cards from your deck.
helpSend: Send a card from your hand to a pile (discard, minor, major, removed).
helpRead: Read out the content of a pile (hand, discard, minor, major, removed).
helpClear: Empty the contents of a pile (deck, hand, discard, minor, major, removed).
reset: All of your piles are now empty.
shuffle: Discard and deck have been shuffled.
clear: Cleared out the contents of pile {1}.
